languages.text: "Как только мы разрешим проблемы с кораблем и установим связь с ключевыми мирами протектората — придет время для вашей Магнэ Ацессио, официальной церемонии вступления в сан Вольного Торговца. Это в большей степени формальное мероприятие — всеми привилегиями, которые дает Патент, вы обладаете уже сейчас. Однако это важная веха вашей личной истории, момент, когда ваше имя появится в списке глав династии фон Валанциус. Мы все с нетерпением ждем этого дня, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "Как только мы разрешим проблемы с кораблем и установим связь с ключевыми мирами торговой империи — придет время для вашей Магнаэ Ацессио, официальной церемонии вступления в сан Вольного Торговца. Это в большей степени формальное мероприятие — всеми привилегиями, которые дает Патент, вы обладаете уже сейчас. Однако это важная веха вашей личной истории, момент, когда ваше имя появится в списке глав династии фон Валанциус. Мы все с нетерпением ждем этого дня, Лорд-капитан".

languages.text: "As soon as we solve the issues plaguing the ship and establish contact with the key worlds of your protectorate, the time will come for your Magnae Accessio, the official ceremony of donning the mantle of the Rogue Trader. It is mostly a formality at this point — you already possess all the privileges granted by the Warrant. And yet it is a major milestone in your personal history, the moment your name graces the list of heads of the von Valancius dynasty. We are all looking forward to that day, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Как только мы разрешим проблемы с кораблем и установим связь с ключевыми мирами протектората — придет время для вашей Магнэ Ацессио, официальной церемонии вступления в сан Вольного Торговца. Это в большей степени формальное мероприятие — всеми привилегиями, которые дает Патент, вы обладаете уже сейчас. Однако это важная веха вашей личной истории, момент, когда ваше имя появится в списке глав династии фон Валанциус. Мы все с нетерпением ждем этого дня, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "As soon as we solve the issues plaguing the ship and establish contact with the key worlds of your merchant empire, the time will come for your Magnae Accessio, the official ceremony of donning the mantle of a Rogue Trader. It is a largely formal affair — you already possess all privileges granted by the Warrant. And yet it is a major milestone in your personal history, the moment your name graces the list of heads of the von Valancius dynasty. We are all looking forward to this day, Lord Captain."

"As soon as we solve the issues plaguing the ship and establish contact with the key worlds of your merchant empire, the time will come for your Magnae Accessio, the official ceremony of donning the mantle of a Rogue Trader. It is a largely formal affair — you already possess all privileges granted by the Warrant. And yet it is a major milestone in your personal history, the moment your name graces the list of heads of the von Valancius dynasty. We are all looking forward to this day, Lord Captain."

"As soon as we solve the issues plaguing the ship and establish contact with the key worlds of your trade empire, the time will come for your Magnae Accessio, the official ceremony of donning the mantle of the Rogue Trader. It is mostly a formality at this point — you already possess all the privileges granted by the Warrant. And yet it is a major milestone in your personal history, the moment your name graces the list of heads of the von Valancius dynasty. We are all looking forward to that day, Lord Captain."

"As soon as we solve the issues plaguing the ship and establish contact with the key worlds of your trade empire, the time will come for your Magnae Accessio, the official ceremony of donning the mantle of the Rogue Trader. It is mostly a formality at this point — you already possess all the privileges granted by the Warrant. And yet it is a major milestone in your personal history, the moment your name graces the list of heads of the von Valancius dynasty. We are all looking forward to that day, Lord Captain."

"As soon as we solve the issues plaguing the ship and establish contact with the key worlds of your protectorate, the time will come for your Magnae Accessio, the official ceremony of donning the mantle of the Rogue Trader. It is mostly a formality at this point — you already possess all the privileges granted by the Warrant. And yet it is a major milestone in your personal history, the moment your name graces the list of heads of the von Valancius dynasty. We are all looking forward to that day, Lord Captain."

languages.text: «En cuanto resolvamos los problemas que aquejan a la nave y establezcamos contacto con los mundos clave de su protectorado, llegará el momento de la Magnae Accessio, la ceremonia oficial por la que se nombra a un Comerciante Independiente. A estas alturas es una mera formalidad, puesto que ya posee todos los privilegios correspondientes a la patente. Sin embargo, es un gran hito personal: el momento en el que su nombre pasa a formar parte de la lista de {mf|patriarcas|matriarcas} de la dinastía von Valancius. Es un momento que todos anticipamos, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}».
languages.original_text: "As soon as we solve the issues plaguing the ship and establish contact with the key worlds of your protectorate, the time will come for your Magnae Accessio, the official ceremony of donning the mantle of the Rogue Trader. It is mostly a formality at this point — you already possess all the privileges granted by the Warrant. And yet it is a major milestone in your personal history, the moment your name graces the list of heads of the von Valancius dynasty. We are all looking forward to that day, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto resolvamos los problemas que aquejan a la nave y establezcamos contacto con los mundos clave de su protectorado, llegará el momento de la Magnae Accessio, la ceremonia oficial por la que se nombra a un Comerciante Independiente. A estas alturas es una mera formalidad, puesto que ya posee todos los privilegios correspondientes a la patente. Sin embargo, es un gran hito personal: el momento en el que su nombre pasa a formar parte de la lista de {mf|patriarcas|matriarcas} de la dinastía von Valancius. Es un momento que todos anticipamos, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}».

languages.text: “等我们解决了飞船的问题，与您麾下的主要世界建立联系之后，便会正式举行继任颂典，您也会正式继承行商浪人的衣钵。说实话，这其实更像是走个过场，因为您实际上已经拥有了贸易授状所赋予的全部特权。不过对您个人而言，这会是个重要的里程碑，因为这会是您的名字正式出现在冯·瓦兰修斯王朝历任领袖名单中的重大时刻。我们都非常期待这一天的到来，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "As soon as we solve the issues plaguing the ship and establish contact with the key worlds of your protectorate, the time will come for your Magnae Accessio, the official ceremony of donning the mantle of the Rogue Trader. It is mostly a formality at this point — you already possess all the privileges granted by the Warrant. And yet it is a major milestone in your personal history, the moment your name graces the list of heads of the von Valancius dynasty. We are all looking forward to that day, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “等我们解决了飞船的问题，与您麾下的主要世界建立联系之后，便会正式举行继任颂典，您也会正式继承行商浪人的衣钵。说实话，这其实更像是走个过场，因为您实际上已经拥有了贸易许可证所赋予的全部特权。不过对您个人而言，这会是个重要的里程碑，因为这会是您的名字正式出现在冯·瓦兰修斯王朝历任领袖名单中的重大时刻。我们都非常期待这一天的到来，舰长大人。”

languages.text: 「船を困らせる問題を解決し、保護領の主要な惑星との連絡が確立ししだい、自由開拓者の任を授かる公式儀式マグナ・アクセシオが執り行われます。今のところほぼ形式的なもので、陛下はすでに令状で与えられたすべての特権をお持ちです。それでも、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の当主リストに御身の名前が載る瞬間は、陛下にとって大きな節目となるでしょうです。皆がその日を楽しみにしています、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "As soon as we solve the issues plaguing the ship and establish contact with the key worlds of your protectorate, the time will come for your Magnae Accessio, the official ceremony of donning the mantle of the Rogue Trader. It is mostly a formality at this point — you already possess all the privileges granted by the Warrant. And yet it is a major milestone in your personal history, the moment your name graces the list of heads of the von Valancius dynasty. We are all looking forward to that day, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「船を困らせる問題を解決し、保護領の主要な惑星との連絡が確立ししだい、自由開拓者の任を授かる公式儀式マグナ・アクセシオが執り行われます。今のところほぼ形式的なもので、陛下はすでに令状で与えられたすべての特権をお持ちです。それでも、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の当主リストに御身の名前が載る瞬間は、陛下にとって大きな節目となるでしょうです。皆がその日を楽しみにしています、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: "Sobald wir die Probleme gelöst haben, die das Schiff plagen, und der Kontakt mit den Hauptwelten Eures Protektorats hergestellt ist, naht der Zeitpunkt Eures Magnae Accessio, der offiziellen Zeremonie Eurer Einführung als {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Das Ganze ist eher eine Formalität, denn Ihr besitzt bereits sämtliche Privilegien, die der Handelsbrief gewährt. Dennoch ist es ein wichtiger Meilenstein in Eurer persönlichen Vita, es ist der Moment, an dem Euer Name in die Liste der Anführer der Dynastie von Valancius aufgenommen wird. Wir freuen uns alle schon sehr auf diesen Tag, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "As soon as we solve the issues plaguing the ship and establish contact with the key worlds of your protectorate, the time will come for your Magnae Accessio, the official ceremony of donning the mantle of the Rogue Trader. It is mostly a formality at this point — you already possess all the privileges granted by the Warrant. And yet it is a major milestone in your personal history, the moment your name graces the list of heads of the von Valancius dynasty. We are all looking forward to that day, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Sobald wir die Probleme gelöst haben, die das Schiff plagen, und der Kontakt mit den Hauptwelten Eures Protektorats hergestellt ist, naht der Zeitpunkt Eures Magnae Accessio, der offiziellen Zeremonie Eurer Einführung als {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Das Ganze ist eher eine Formalität, denn Ihr besitzt bereits sämtliche Privilegien, die der Handelsbrief gewährt. Dennoch ist es ein wichtiger Meilenstein in Eurer persönlichen Vita, es ist der Moment, an dem Euer Name in die Liste der Anführer der Dynastie von Valancius aufgenommen wird. Wir freuen uns alle schon sehr auf diesen Tag, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « Dès que nous aurons résolu les problèmes du vaisseau et rétabli le contact avec les mondes clés de votre protectorat, il sera temps d'organiser votre Magnae Accessio, la cérémonie officielle d'accession au titre de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. À ce stade, ce n'est plus qu'une simple formalité, car vous disposez déjà de tous les privilèges accordés par la lettre de marque. Cela n'en reste pas moins une étape importante de votre histoire personnelle, le moment où votre nom rejoindra la liste des dirigeants de la dynastie von Valancius. Nous avons hâte d'y assister, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "As soon as we solve the issues plaguing the ship and establish contact with the key worlds of your protectorate, the time will come for your Magnae Accessio, the official ceremony of donning the mantle of the Rogue Trader. It is mostly a formality at this point — you already possess all the privileges granted by the Warrant. And yet it is a major milestone in your personal history, the moment your name graces the list of heads of the von Valancius dynasty. We are all looking forward to that day, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Dès que nous aurons résolu les problèmes du vaisseau et rétabli le contact avec les mondes clés de votre protectorat, il sera temps d'organiser votre Magnae Accessio, la cérémonie officielle d'accession au titre de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. À ce stade, ce n'est plus qu'une simple formalité, car vous disposez déjà de tous les privilèges accordés par la lettre de marque. Cela n'en reste pas moins une étape importante de votre histoire personnelle, le moment où votre nom rejoindra la liste des dirigeants de la dynastie von Valancius. Nous avons hâte d'y assister, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: "Gemimizin muzdarip olduğu sorunları çözüp protektoranızdaki kilit dünyalarla iletişimi sağlar sağlamaz sıra Magnae Accessio'nuza, yani Hür Tacirlik makamına çıkışınız için düzenlenecek resmî törene gelecek. Şu noktada aslen formaliteden başka bir şey değil, Ruhsatname'nin sağladığı ayrıcalıklara zaten sahipsiniz. Yine de isminizin von Valancius hanedanlığının önderleri arasına yazılacağı an, kişisel hikâyenizde önemli bir dönüm noktası olacak. O günün gelmesini iple çekiyoruz Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "As soon as we solve the issues plaguing the ship and establish contact with the key worlds of your protectorate, the time will come for your Magnae Accessio, the official ceremony of donning the mantle of the Rogue Trader. It is mostly a formality at this point — you already possess all the privileges granted by the Warrant. And yet it is a major milestone in your personal history, the moment your name graces the list of heads of the von Valancius dynasty. We are all looking forward to that day, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Gemiye musallat olan sorunları çözüp protektoranızdaki kilit dünyalarla iletişimi sağladıktan sonra sıra Magnae Accessio'nuza, Hür Tacir görevine gelişiniz için düzenlenecek resmî seremoniye gelecek. Şu noktada formaliteden başka bir şey değil, Ruhsatname'nizin sağladığı ayrıcalıklar zaten elinizde ancak yine de isminizin von Valancius hanedanlığının liderleri arasına yazılacağı an, kişisel hikâyenizde önemli bir dönüm noktası konumunda. O günün gelmesini iple çekiyoruz Lord Kaptan."
